info.name: WebSkype Dark
info.description: Dark theme for the Web Skype client
info.additionalInfo:
Tested with Firefox Nightly

Changelog

v6
- Fix some stuff that broke

v5
- Restyled notification about session
- Fix bubble arrows

v4
- Restyled notification about cookies

v3
- Fixed background color of pasted links

v2
- Improved contacts page
- Iproved conversation creation page
- Changed corner sky colors

v1
- Initial version
